Terms and Conditions

User Agreement for Mazadat Platform/Mobile Application

1. Introduction and Acceptance

Welcome to the Mazadat Platform. The terms and conditions set out under this User Agreement, the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Fees Policy and all policies posted on our platform govern your access to and use of the mazadat platform/mobile application and its related sub-domains, sites, services and tools (collectively the "{" "} Mazadat Platform").

Mazadat ("we", "us" or "{" "} Mazadat"), provides its users, through the Mazadat Platform, with an online marketplace which allows the sale and purchase of items between sellers and buyers, by utilizing either a "Buy Now" format (also referred to as the "Direct Sale" format) or under an "Auction" format (collectively the "Service").

By accepting the terms and conditions set out herein (including all information and policies linked herein), and by accessing, browsing or using the Mazadat Platform, you represent and warrant that you agree to comply fully with and adhere to these terms and conditions with Mazadat in relation to your use of and access to the Mazadat Platform and the Service (the "User Agreement"). The User Agreement, the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Fees Policy and such other policies posted by Mazadat on the Mazadat Platform may be updated and amended by Mazadat at any time at its sole discretion. For the purpose of this User Agreement, the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Fees Policy and any such other policies posted by Mazadat on the Mazadat Platform, the terms "user(s)", "you" and "your" shall mean any person who uses the Mazadat Platform or the Service in any manner whatsoever including persons browsing the Mazadat Platform and its content, posting items/products and or services for sale or advertising on the Mazadat Platform, placing/making bids on auctioned items, posting comments, questions or any content, of whatsoever nature, or responding to any advertisements, listings or content on the Mazadat Platform.

Before you may become or continue to be a member of the Mazadat Platform, you must read, agree with and accept this User Agreement, the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Fees Policy and such other policies linked herein which will govern your use of and access to the Mazadat Platform and the Service. You should read this User Agreement, the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Fees Policy and access and read all further linked information referred to in this User Agreement, as such information contains further terms, conditions and obligations that apply to you as a user of the Mazadat Platform and the Service provided thereby. Such linked information including but not limited to the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy and the Fees Policy is hereby incorporated by reference into this User Agreement and shall be binding upon you in your access to and use of the Mazadat Platform and the Service.

This User Agreement is effective upon acceptance. If you do not agree to be bound by this User Agreement and all policies linked herein please do not access, register with or use this Mazadat Platform. You understand and agree that you are solely responsible for reviewing this User Agreement, the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Fees Policy and all policies posted by Mazadat on the Mazadat Platform from time to time. Should you object to any term or condition of the User Agreement, the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Fees Policy, any guideline, policy, or any subsequent amendments or changes thereto or become dissatisfied with the Mazadat Platform or the Service in any way, your only available choice and remedy is to immediately discontinue your use of and access to the Mazadat Platform.

2. The Service

The Mazadat Platform is an online marketplace allowing its users, acting in compliance with this User Agreement, the Privacy Policy, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Fees Policy and such other policies posted by Mazadat on the Mazadat Platform, to offer, advertise, promote, sell, and buy items, services and products. Mazadat does not offer banking services nor is Mazadat an auction house. Additionally, Mazadat is neither a broker nor an agent for any of the users, whether buyers or sellers, accessing or using the Mazadat Platform and the Service.

Although you may be able to offer items, purchase and sell items, make payments and conclude transactions via the Mazadat Platform, Mazadat does not have possession of or enjoy legal title to anything, of whatsoever nature, listed, offered or sold by users through the Mazadat Platform. Mazadat is not involved in nor is it a party to the actual transaction concluded between buyers and sellers via the Mazadat Platform. The contract for sale of any item/product and/or service listed or advertised on the Mazadat Platform shall be a strictly bipartite contract between a seller and a buyer and Mazadat shall, in no event, be involved in such sale and purchase transactions. While Mazadat may provide pricing, postage, listing, item details and other guidance on the Mazadat Platform, such guidance is solely informational, and you may decide to follow it or not at your sole discretion. Mazadat does not pre-screen, review or guarantee the accuracy of users' listings or content and you shall be solely responsible for reviewing and ensuring the accuracy and genuineness of all information and data relating to the item(s)/product(s) which you intend to buy through the Mazadat Platform.

You hereby acknowledge that:

- Mazadat is not a supplier, manufacturer, producer or distributer of any items/products and/or service listed, offered, advertised, promoted, sold or bought by users via the Mazadat Platform;

- Mazadat is neither a broker nor an agent of the users, whether buyers or sellers, of the Mazadat Platform;

- Mazadat does not have possession of or enjoy legal title to anything, of whatsoever nature, offered, listed, advertised, promoted or sold by users through the Mazadat Platform;

- Mazadat is not and will not, in any event, be a party to any transaction concluded between a seller and a buyer through the Mazadat Platform;

- Mazadat is not responsible for any non-performance or breach of any contract entered into between users and does not transfer legal ownership of items/products from a seller to a buyer. The contract for sale of any item/product shall be a strictly bipartite contract between the seller and the buyer. At no time shall any right, title or interest over any item/product, listed, offered or sold by users accessing and using the Mazadat Platform, vest with Mazadat nor shall Mazadat have any obligations or liabilities in respect of such item, its condition, its compliance with the information/data posted on the Mazadat Platform or the contract between the buyer and seller;

- Mazadat has no control over any element of transactions concluded between users, and does not guarantee or make any representation or warranty as to the attributes (including but not limited to, existence, legality, safety, quality, worth or marketability) of the items/products and/or services proposed to be sold or; the truth or accuracy of users' content, listings or feedback; the ability of sellers to sell items/products and/or services; the ability of buyers to pay for items/products and/or services; or that a buyer or seller will actually complete a transaction, return an item/product or seek a refund for the service;

- Mazadat does not make any representations or warranties as to the attributes (including but not limited to legal title, legal capacity, creditworthiness, or identity) of any of its users;

- Mazadat does not implicitly or explicitly support or endorse offering, listing, the sale or purchase of any items/products and/or services on the Mazadat Platform;

- Mazadat does not control, and is neither liable nor responsible for ads, listing, promotions, directory information, business listings/information, bids, messages between users, including without limitation all forms of electronic and non-electronic communication sent from outside the Mazadat Platform's domain, or offerings, comments, user postings, files, images, photos, videos, sounds, or any other information, material or data, in any format, made available through the Mazadat Platform (" Content");

- Mazadat is not responsible for unsatisfactory or delayed performance, losses, damages or delays as a result of items/products which are unavailable;

- Mazadat accepts no liability for any errors or omissions, whether on behalf of itself or third parties;

- Mazadat excludes all implied warranties, terms and conditions and is not liable for any loss of money, goodwill or reputation, or any special, indirect or consequential damages arising directly or indirectly, out of your use of or your inability to use the Mazadat Platform;

- Mazadat is not required to mediate or resolve any dispute or disagreement arising between users of the Mazadat Platform nor will it, in any event, become a party to such disputes;

- Mazadat shall neither be responsible nor liable for issuing invoices on behalf of sellers using the Mazadat Platform;

- Mazadat shall neither be responsible nor liable for invoices generated by sellers using invoice generation tools made available to them via the Mazadat Platform;

- by using the Mazadat Platform and the Service, you may be exposed to Content that is offensive, indecent, inaccurate, misleading, or otherwise objectionable, for which Mazadat is neither liable nor responsible;

- your use of and access to the Mazadat Platform and the Service and your listing, offering, purchase or sale of any item/product and/or service through the Mazadat Platform is done at your own risk and cost; you are solely responsible for and must evaluate, and bear all risks associated with, your access to and use of the Mazadat Platform and the Service and the use of any Content made available through the Mazadat Platform; and

- you are solely liable and responsible for ensuring that any Content posted by you or from Your Account shall comply with applicable laws and regulations, this User Agreement, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Privacy Policy or any such other policies as may be posted by Mazadat from time to time.

3. Fees

Membership on the Mazadat Platform is free. Mazadat does not charge any fee for browsing, bidding on or buying listed items/products and/or services on the Mazadat Platform. Mazadat charges transaction fees, as set out under the Fees Policy, to all sellers when their item/product and/or service is successfully sold on the Mazadat Platform, regardless of whether such sale is concluded through the Buy Now format or through the Auction format as set out under Section (8) [Buying and Bidding] of this User Agreement.


Sellers must pay all fees and any applicable taxes and charges due and payable to Mazadat after a successful sale with a valid payment method acceptable to Mazadat. Mazadat is entitled, without any objection on the part of the seller, to deduct fees (including any applicable taxes and charges) due and payable to Mazadat as set out under the Fees Policy from amounts paid in cash, or any such other acceptable payment method, by the relevant buyer(s) at the Collection Point. In the event that a buyer does not complete the transaction, for reasons not attributable to the seller, the seller may seek a refund of the relevant transaction fees from Mazadat by submitting an acceptable online no-sale claim with the relevant supporting documents as may be requested by Mazadat.

Transaction fees due and payable by sellers to Mazadat upon the successful sale of their item(s)/product(s) and/or service(s) on the Mazadat Platform are set out under the Fees Policy. Before you offer or list an item/product and/or service for sale through the Mazadat Platform, we request that you review the fees, set out under the Fees Policy, which you will be charged for each successful sale concluded via the Mazadat Platform. Mazadat may, from time to time, amend the fees set out under the Fees Policy with immediate effect by posting the changes on the Mazadat Platform and without the need for further notification. You hereby acknowledge that you are solely responsible for reviewing the Fees Policy and that you shall be liable for all amounts incurred by you in accordance with the Fees Policy.

Mazadat may choose to temporarily change the fees set out under the Fees Policy for promotional events or new services, and such temporary changes are effective in accordance with their terms when we post them on the Mazadat Platform.


You must pay all fees and any applicable taxes and charges due and payable by you to Mazadat ,in accordance with the terms of the Fees Policy, after a successful sale with a valid payment method acceptable to Mazadat and within a maximum period of (2) calendar days calculated from the date of the relevant invoice issued to you from Mazadat. You hereby acknowledge that Mazadat is entitled, without any objection from you, to deduct all fees (including any applicable taxes and charges) due and payable by you to Mazadat in accordance with the terms of the Fees Policy from amounts received by Mazadat in cash, or any such other acceptable method of payment, from the buyer(s) of the item(s)/products and/or service(s) sold by you through the Mazadat Platform. Unless otherwise stated, all fees shall be quoted in Egyptian Pounds (EGP).

In the event of non-payment of fees and/or any applicable taxes and charges by you to Mazadat (including fees and applicable taxes and charges payable by you for Paid Promotions Service as set out under this User Agreement), and without prejudice to any other rights and remedies available to Mazadat under this User Agreement or at law, Mazadat shall be entitled to:

- issue you with a warning setting out the non-payment event and the amount due and payable by you (including all applicable taxes and charges).

- temporarily or indefinitely suspend, limit or withdraw your access to the Mazadat Platform and/or Your Account, if you fail to make the outstanding payment within (2) calendar days calculated from the date of the warning issued by Mazadat to you.

- for amounts due, at its sole discretion, deduct all amounts owed (including applicable taxes and fees) from your My Mazadat Wallet account balance or from any such cash amounts as may be held by Mazadat on your behalf (and you acknowledge and agree that Mazadat is entitled to make such deductions without any objection from you in these circumstances) and confirm the same to you by email.

- retain possession of any or all item(s)/product(s) belonging to you and held at a Collection Point until full payment of amounts due to Mazadat (including applicable taxes and charges and all late payment fees) has been made.

- invoice you for a fixed late payment fee, which is to be calculated as (10)% of the total unpaid/delayed amount.

- take any steps which Mazadat considers necessary including, without limitation, legal action for recovery of the outstanding fees, late payment fees and/or any applicable taxes and charges.

Despite our best efforts, a small number of the items listed on the Mazadat Platform may not be correctly priced. We will verify pricing when processing your order. If we have made a mistake and an item's correct price is higher than the price posted on the Mazadat Platform, we may either contact you before shipping or pick up to determine whether you want to buy the product at the correct price or cancel your order. If an item's correct price is lower than the price posted on the Mazadat Platform, we will charge you the lower amount.

4. My Mazadat Wallet

Upon your registration with the Mazadat Platform, you will have access to your My Mazadat Wallet, located on the Your Account section of the Mazadat Platform. Your My Mazadat Wallet will reflect (a) all amounts due and payable by you to Mazadat (including, but not limited to, transaction fees and fees payable for Paid Promotions Service), (b) all amounts payable by you, acting as buyer, to Mazadat or others users of the Mazadat Platform for items/products and/or services purchased by you under either the Buy Now format or the Auction format, and (c) all amounts due and payable to you, acting as seller, by users for your items/products and/or services successfully sold through the Mazadat Platform.

Amounts payable by buyers to you, acting as seller on the Mazadat Platform, for items/products and/or services sold by you through the Mazadat Platform shall be collected and stored on your My Mazadat Wallet. You can use your My Mazadat Wallet balance to make purchases on the Mazadat Platform as well as to make payments to Mazadat for amounts incurred by you in accordance with the Fees Policy.

You may recharge your My Mazadat Wallet for use on the Mazadat Platform through one of the following methods:

- Credit or debit cards;

- Fawry; and

- Cash.

Your My Mazadat Wallet balance will be added in 1 business day after payment is made through one of the methods set out above. Please note that Fridays, Saturdays and public holidays are off, accordingly if the balance is paid on Thursday, Friday, Saturday, or on any day that is a public holiday the balance will be added on the next working day.

You hereby acknowledge that Mazadat may, at its sole discretion, deduct from your My Mazadat Wallet available account balance all amounts due and payable by you to Mazadat (including all applicable taxes and charges and late payment fees) without any objection from you and without the need for further notification to that effect.

5. Paid Promotions Service

Mazadat may offer its users a "Paid Promotions Service", whereby users, wishing to utilize this service, are charged a non-refundable fee to have their ads/listing(s) posted on select locations on the Mazadat Platform in order to increase the visibility of the item(s)/product(s)/service(s) being sold. Fees payable for Paid Promotions Service are non-refundable and shall be payable to Mazadat regardless of whether or not the item(s)/product(s) and/or service(s) being promoted is successfully sold. Fees payable for Paid Promotions Service will not be refunded to the relevant user in the event that the ad(s)/listing(s) the subject of the Paid Promotions Service is removed or deleted by Mazadat, at its sole discretion, for violating applicable laws and regulations, the terms and conditions of this User Agreement, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Privacy Policy, the Fees Policy or any such other policy as may be posted by Mazadat from time to time.

Fees payable by users wishing to subscribe to the Paid Promotions Service are set out under the Fees Policy. You must pay all fees (including all applicable taxes and charges) due and payable by you to Mazadat for the Paid Promotions Service in advance, whereby such amounts shall be automatically charged to your My Mazadat Wallet. Failure to make the requisite payment to Mazadat shall relinquish Mazadat from any obligation or duty to post your ad(s)/listing(s). Mazadat shall be entitled, without prejudice to other remedies available to it under this User Agreement and at law, to remove any ad(s)/listing(s) and Content from the Mazadat Platform in the event that the user in question fails to pay the fees (including applicable taxes and charges) associated with the Paid Promotions Service. In the event of non-payment by you of the fees (including applicable taxes and charges) payable to Mazadat for the Paid Promotions Service to which you have subscribed, Mazadat may, at its sole discretion, adopt any or all of the measures set out under Section (3) [Fees].

Mazadat may, from time to time, amend the fees payable for the Paid Promotions Service, as set out under the Fees Policy, with immediate effect by posting the changes on the Mazadat Platform and without the need for further notification. You hereby acknowledge that you are solely responsible for reviewing the Fees Policy and that you shall be liable for all amounts incurred by you in accordance with the Fees Policy.

You hereby agree and acknowledge that:

- software algorithms are used to determine the frequency of appearance of the item(s)/ads/listing(s) the subject of the Paid Promotions Service.

- Mazadat does not make any guarantees that the item(s)/ad(s)/listing(s) the subject of the Paid Promotion Service shall (1) appear every time in the featured section; or (2) appear for a predetermined number of times in the featured section

- Mazadat makes no representation or warranties in relation to the number of visitors to the Mazadat Platform or to the number of users who will view your ad(s)/listing(s) the subject of the Paid Promotions Service.

6. Listing/Posting Conditions and Use of the Mazadat Platform

In connection with posting items/products and/or services or Content, of whatsoever nature, on the Mazadat Platform you will not:

- post items/products to which you do not enjoy legal title, or which you are are not duly authorized to offer and/or sell;

- post counterfeit or stolen items/products;

- post items/products contrary to the terms and conditions of the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy or which are illegal to sell and/or distribute according to applicable laws, regulations and decisions issued by competent authorities;

- post items/products or Content that violates any laws, rules, regulations, decisions issued by competent authorities, guidelines, third party rights or our policies;

- post items/products or Content which infringes the intellectual property or proprietary rights of others or which you do not have a right, for any reason, to link to, make available or include;

- post Content which includes links of whatsoever nature, including, but not limited to links to commercial services or third-party websites;

- post items/products or any Content that is copyrighted or patented, protected by trade secret or trademark, or otherwise subject to third party intellectual property or proprietary rights, including privacy and publicity rights, unless you are the owner of such rights or have due permission or a license from their rightful owner to post the material and to grant Mazadat all of the license rights granted by virtue of this User Agreement;

- post items/products or any Content which may (in our sole discretion) be considered culturally or religiously offensive in any way or which may constitute, encourage or promote discrimination, on the basis of, amongst other things, gender, religion, race, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age or disability;

- post Content that is (in our sole discretion) harmful, abusive, unlawful, threatening, false, fraudulent, inaccurate, deceptive, misleading, libellous, blasphemous, defamatory, slanderous, unlawfully threatening or would be reasonably considered to constitute harassment;

- post Content that is (in our sole discretion) obscene, sexual, pornographic, pedophilic, invasive of another's privacy or other rights, hateful, or racially, ethnically objectionable, disparaging, relating to or encouraging money laundering or illegal gambling or harms or could harm minors in any way or otherwise unlawful in any manner whatsoever;

- post Content that promotes, encourages or relates in any way to terrorism or terrorist financing;

- post Content that includes personal or identifying information/data relating to another individual without that individual's prior explicit consent or which violates, in any way, the provisions of applicable data protection laws;

- post comments, questions or answers that are not factual in nature including without limitation make any racist comments, use profanity, abuse another user, disrespect another's culture or make any other derogatory or inappropriate comments;

- post information or Content which may (in our sole discretion) constitute offensive or critical political content or content that is contrary to the public order and morality;

- post any information or Content or list items which (in our sole discretion) may not be considered to be in compliance with general Islamic Shariah law, rules, morals, values, ethics and traditions;

- use "keyword spamming" in listing items for sale (when you place brand names or other inappropriate keywords in a title or description for the purpose of gaining attention or diverting members to a listing);

- post Content or list items which may (in our sole discretion) threaten national security, public health;

- post Content that impersonates any person or entity, including, but not limited to, a Mazadat employee, or falsely states or otherwise misrepresents an affiliation with a person or entity; or

- post Content that constitutes or contains "network marketing", "multi-level marketing", "Ponzi and pyramid schemes," "affiliate marketing," "link referral code," "junk mail," "spam," "chain letters," or unsolicited advertisements of a commercial nature.

Additionally, while using and accessing the Mazadat Platform and the Service you hereby represent and warrant that you will not:

- fail to deliver payment for items/products and/or services purchased by you through the Mazadat Platform, under either the Auction format or the Buy Now format;

- fail to deliver items/products purchased from you through the Mazadat Platform, under either the Auction format or the Buy Now format;

- fail to delivery payment (including all applicable taxes and charges) for services provided to you by Mazadat;

- attempt to conclude transactions relating to an auction or offer for sale on the Mazadat Platform (including by cancelling an auction or offer of sale) outside of the Mazadat Platform;

- use contacts made by buying or selling on the Mazadat Platform to solicit (including by email or otherwise) sales on other items directly and/or from another website;

- directly or indirectly, offer, attempt to offer, trade in, attempt to trade in, or include descriptions or links to items that to your knowledge are fake, damaged, false or misleading or that may through normal use harm another user's interest or health;

- post/list items/products in an incorrect condition category, as defined and set out under the Item Condition Guide, which does not accurately reflect or is in any way misleading with respect to the true condition of the item/product in question;

- attempt to tamper with or disrupt any auctions on the Mazadat Platform;

- test the Mazadat Platform with false Bids or Purchases;

- circumvent or manipulate our fee structure, the billing process, or fees owed to Mazadat;

- take any action that may undermine the Mazadat Platform's feedback and ratings systems;

- distribute or post spam, unsolicited or bulk electronic communications, chain letters, or pyramid schemes;

- distribute viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time bombs, cancelbots other computer programming technologies that may harm the Mazadat Platform, or the interests or property of the Mazadat Platform's users;

- interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Mazadat Platform;

- attempt to take over another user's account or carry out any hacking or phishing of the Mazadat Platform or user accounts and related features; or

- abuse Mazadat's policies, this User Agreement, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, the Privacy Policy or terms and conditions posted on the Mazadat Platform from time to time.

Mazadat has the right, in its sole and absolute discretion, to refuse, delete or move any Content, ad(s) or listing(s) that is or may be available through the Service, for violating this User Agreement, the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy or the Privacy Policy or any such other policies as may be posted by Mazadat on the Mazadat Platform from time to time.

7. Seller Obligations

In accessing and using the Mazadat Platform as a seller or supplier of item(s)/products and/or services, you hereby additionally represent, warrant and acknowledge that:

- once you have offered/listed an item/product and/or service, in your capacity as seller, for sale on the Mazadat Platform, you shall be irrevocably and unconditionally bound by the outcome of the Buy Now format or the Auction format, as the case may be.

- listing an item/product and/or service for sale on the Mazadat Platform represents an irrevocable commitment by you to conclude the transaction with the relevant buyer and to successfully deliver the item/product or to perform the service.

- you are solely liable and responsible for the transport of your item(s)/product(s) to and from Collection Points.

- you are solely responsible for packaging all your items/products safely and in good manner to avoid damages.

- you are solely responsible for any damage, of whatever nature, that may occur to your items/products while being transported to and from Collection Points.

- you enjoy the power and licenses, permissions, authorizations, proprietary rights, consents and permits in the items/products and to sell and promote said items/products in the Arab Republic of Egypt.

- your items/products conform to all requisite quality and safety standards.

- you are solely responsible for (a) providing all information/data pertaining to the items/products and/or services sold by you, and (b) the accuracy and genuineness of said information/data.

- you shall be solely responsible for any items/products placed or distributed through the Mazadat Platform and breach of any third-party contracts.

- your placement of items/products and/or services and their sale through the Mazadat Platform will not be in breach of any applicable laws or third-party rights.

- you will not engage in any unfair trade practices and publish any inaccurate or misleading advertisement or information about items/products and/or services on or via the Mazadat Platform.

- you shall abide by all laws and regulations applicable to you as seller/supplier.

Without prejudice to the rights and remedies available to Mazadat under this User Agreement or at law, Mazadat may take such steps as it deems appropriate or necessary including:

- temporarily or indefinitely suspending any account or banning any user, acting as seller, who engages in any behavior which violates the terms and conditions of this Section [Seller Obligations];

- temporarily or indefinitely suspending any account or banning any user, acting as seller, who has repeatedly failed to conclude transactions with the relevant buyers or has failed to deliver the relevant items/products; and

- taking legal action against users who intentionally list/post erroneous, fictitious or fraudulent items/products and/or services.

8. Buying and Bidding

Mazadat provides users using the Mazadat Platform with two formats by virtue of which sellers may sell/list their items on the Mazadat Platform. Sellers may either choose to list their items on the Mazadat Platform under a "Buy Now" format or under an "Auction" format. Sellers may also choose to have their items listed with both the "Buy Now" format and the "Auction" format made available to buyers.

All bids under the Auction format ("Bids") and all purchases under the Buy Now format (" Purchases") on the Mazadat Platform shall be binding upon you and are a commitment by you to complete the purchase of the item on which you have placed the Bid or which you have purchased. Once you have placed a Bid you may not withdraw, revoke or amend your Bid. Once you have placed a Bid you may only amend your Bid by placing a higher Bid on the item(s) in question. With respect to the Buy Now format, Mazadat may allow you to withdraw or cancel your Purchase(s) any time prior to the relevant seller having dropped-off the purchased item(s) at the Collection Point. Once the relevant seller has dropped-off the purchased item(s) at the Collection Point, as evidenced by an e-mail sent to you from Mazadat to that effect, you may not withdraw, revoke or amend your Purchase(s).

Under the Auction format, in the event that you are the highest bidder for any item (the " Winning Bidder"), you are obligated to complete the transaction with the seller and your Bid shall be binding upon you. In order for you to qualify and be identified as the Winning Bidder of an auction, the following priority parameters are applied by Mazadat:

- Price: a higher price Bid always supersedes any lower price bids;

- Quantity: Between Bids of the same price, a Bid for a higher quantity shall supersede;

- Time: Between Bids of the same price and for the same quantity, the Bid which was placed at an earlier point in time shall supersede other such Bids.

You acknowledge and agree that in the event that dual Winning Bidders are displayed on the Mazadat Platform for a single auction, or in the event that an equal Bid and a Purchase are simultaneously placed by two users on the same item, the user who receives an email from the Mazadat Platform, at Mazadat's sole discretion, declaring them the Winning Bidder will be the only Winning Bidder for that auction. Mazadat's decision on the success or otherwise of a Bid shall be final and binding. Mazadat reserves the right to reject or void bids, whether winning or not, that it deems not to have been made in good faith, are in violation to this User Agreement, to be false or that are restricted or prohibited.

You may increase the amount or volume of your Bid or Purchase, but you may not reduce the amount or volume of your Bid or Purchase or withdraw / cancel your Bid or Purchase. By bidding or purchasing an item you agree to be bound by the conditions of sale included by the seller in the item's description posted on the Mazadat Platform (so long as those conditions of sale are not in violation of this User Agreement or the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy and only to the extent that such conditions are compliant with applicable laws and regulations).

In placing/making Bids and or Purchases on the Mazadat Platform, you agree not to:

- test the Mazadat Platform with false Bids or Purchases;

- place Bids or make Purchases and then attempt to revoke or cancel the Bids/Purchases, refuse to complete the relevant transactions or refuse to pick up the purchased items(s) from the Collection Point;

- attempt to tamper with or disrupt an Auction by placing Bids while having no intention to complete the transactions or purchase the item(s) on which you placed your Bids; or

- use a false name, other false personal information or use an unauthorised or known invalid credit card to Bid or Purchase.

Without prejudice to the rights and remedies available to Mazadat under this User Agreement or at law, Mazadat may take such steps as it deems appropriate or necessary including:

- temporarily or indefinitely suspending any account or user who engages in any behavior which violates the terms and conditions of this Section [Buying and Bidding]; and taking legal action against users who intentionally enter erroneous, fictitious or fraudulent Bids or Purchases.

Please be aware that even if you do not give Mazadat your real name, your web browser transmits a unique address to us, which can be used by law enforcement officials to identify you.

9. Collection Points (Click and Collect)

Upon your registration with the Mazadat Platform, you will have access to your My Mazadat Wallet, located on the Your Account section of the Mazadat Platform. Your My Mazadat Wallet will reflect (a) all amounts due and payable by you to Mazadat (including, but not limited to, transaction fees and fees payable for Paid Promotions Service), (b) all amounts payable by you, acting as buyer, to Mazadat or others users of the Mazadat Platform for items/products and/or services purchased by you under either the Buy Now format or the Auction format, and (c) all amounts due and payable to you, acting as seller, by users for your items/products and/or services successfully sold through the Mazadat Platform.

Amounts payable by buyers to you, acting as seller on the Mazadat Platform, for items/products and/or services sold by you through the Mazadat Platform shall be collected and stored on your My Mazadat Wallet. You can use your My Mazadat Wallet balance to make purchases on the Mazadat Platform as well as to make payments to Mazadat for amounts incurred by you in accordance with the Fees Policy.

You may recharge your My Mazadat Wallet for use on the Mazadat Platform through one of the following methods:

- Credit or debit cards;

- Fawry; and

- Cash.

Your My Mazadat Wallet balance will be added in 1 business day after payment is made through one of the methods set out above. Please note that Fridays, Saturdays and public holidays are off, accordingly if the balance is paid on Thursday, Friday, Saturday, or on any day that is a public holiday the balance will be added on the next working day.

You hereby acknowledge that Mazadat may, at its sole discretion, deduct from your My Mazadat Wallet available account balance all amounts due and payable by you to Mazadat (including all applicable taxes and charges and late payment fees) without any objection from you and without the need for further notification to that effect.

8. Buying and Bidding

Mazadat provides users using the Mazadat Platform with two formats by virtue of which sellers may sell/list their items on the Mazadat Platform. Sellers may either choose to list their items on the Mazadat Platform under a "Buy Now" format or under an "Auction" format. Sellers may also choose to have their items listed with both the "Buy Now" format and the "Auction" format made available to buyers.

All bids under the Auction format ("Bids") and all purchases under the Buy Now format (" Purchases") on the Mazadat Platform shall be binding upon you and are a commitment by you to complete the purchase of the item on which you have placed the Bid or which you have purchased. Once you have placed a Bid you may not withdraw, revoke or amend your Bid. Once you have placed a Bid you may only amend your Bid by placing a higher Bid on the item(s) in question. With respect to the Buy Now format, Mazadat may allow you to withdraw or cancel your Purchase(s) any time prior to the relevant seller having dropped-off the purchased item(s) at the Collection Point. Once the relevant seller has dropped-off the purchased item(s) at the Collection Point, as evidenced by an e-mail sent to you from Mazadat to that effect, you may not withdraw, revoke or amend your Purchase(s).

Under the Auction format, in the event that you are the highest bidder for any item (the " Winning Bidder"), you are obligated to complete the transaction with the seller and your Bid shall be binding upon you. In order for you to qualify and be identified as the Winning Bidder of an auction, the following priority parameters are applied by Mazadat:

- Price: a higher price Bid always supersedes any lower price bids;

- Quantity: Between Bids of the same price, a Bid for a higher quantity shall supersede;

- Time: Between Bids of the same price and for the same quantity, the Bid which was placed at an earlier point in time shall supersede other such Bids.

You acknowledge and agree that in the event that dual Winning Bidders are displayed on the Mazadat Platform for a single auction, or in the event that an equal Bid and a Purchase are simultaneously placed by two users on the same item, the user who receives an email from the Mazadat Platform, at Mazadat's sole discretion, declaring them the Winning Bidder will be the only Winning Bidder for that auction. Mazadat's decision on the success or otherwise of a Bid shall be final and binding. Mazadat reserves the right to reject or void bids, whether winning or not, that it deems not to have been made in good faith, are in violation to this User Agreement, to be false or that are restricted or prohibited.

You may increase the amount or volume of your Bid or Purchase, but you may not reduce the amount or volume of your Bid or Purchase or withdraw / cancel your Bid or Purchase. By bidding or purchasing an item you agree to be bound by the conditions of sale included by the seller in the item's description posted on the Mazadat Platform (so long as those conditions of sale are not in violation of this User Agreement or the Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy and only to the extent that such conditions are compliant with applicable laws and regulations).

In placing/making Bids and or Purchases on the Mazadat Platform, you agree not to:

- test the Mazadat Platform with false Bids or Purchases;

- place Bids or make Purchases and then attempt to revoke or cancel the Bids/Purchases, refuse to complete the relevant transactions or refuse to pick up the purchased items(s) from the Collection Point;

- attempt to tamper with or disrupt an Auction by placing Bids while having no intention to complete the transactions or purchase the item(s) on which you placed your Bids; or

- use a false name, other false personal information or use an unauthorised or known invalid credit card to Bid or Purchase.

Without prejudice to the rights and remedies available to Mazadat under this User Agreement or at law, Mazadat may take such steps as it deems appropriate or necessary including:

- temporarily or indefinitely suspending any account or user who engages in any behavior which violates the terms and conditions of this Section [Buying and Bidding]; and taking legal action against users who intentionally enter erroneous, fictitious or fraudulent Bids or Purchases.

Please be aware that even if you do not give Mazadat your real name, your web browser transmits a unique address to us, which can be used by law enforcement officials to identify you.

9. Collection Points (Click and Collect)

Items successfully purchased and sold by users through the Mazadat Platform shall be delivered by the relevant seller to and collected by the relevant buyer from the Mazadat collection points "Collection Points" (also referred to on the Mazadat Platform as "Service Points" and "Service Centers"), the locations of which can be found on the web and mobile apps of the Mazadat Platform. The Collection Points will be dedicated to (1) receiving items dropped off by sellers who have concluded a successful sale through the Mazadat Platform, and (2) allowing buyers to pick-up as well as pay for item(s) which they have purchased through the Mazadat Platform. For the avoidance of doubt, Collection Points shall not act as points of sale or service centers for items/products sold through the Mazadat Platform. At no time shall any right, title or interest over any item/product dropped off at the Collection Points vest with Mazadat nor shall Mazadat have any obligations or liabilities in respect of such item.

Mazadat will neither be liable nor responsible for any delay in dropping off any item(s) by a seller, nor will Mazadat be liable for any delay in picking up purchased item(s) by a buyer.

Both buyers and sellers shall be required to produce QR codes (generated by the Mazadat Platform) and their IDs to the Mazadat employees at the Collection Points. Buyers and/or Sellers shall not be allowed to drop-off or pick-up items at the Collection Point in the event that they are unable to produce the requisite QR code and ID.

Any user of the Mazadat Platform shall be entitled, after having personally visited a Collection Point and physically presented their ID to the Mazadat employee at least once, to authorize other persons to act on their behalf with respect to picking-up and dropping-off items/products as well as making payments at the Collection Points. Users wishing to authorize other persons shall be required to present the Mazadat employees stationed at the Collection Point with said authorized persons' name, ID number, mobile number and such other information as may be requested by Mazadat, or alternatively, through the web and mobile apps of the Mazadat Platform. Users shall be solely liable for obtaining the express consent of the authorized person in question prior to sharing their data/information with Mazadat. Mazadat shall, under no circumstances, be liable for any third-party data presented to Mazadat by users of the Mazadat Platform.

A storage fee, as set out under the Fees Policy, shall be applied and shall be paid by the relevant user in the event that the user fails to pick-up/receive their inventory (including items rejected or returned by a buyer) within (2) calendar days from the date on which the items are received at the relevant Collection Point.

Without prejudice to Mazadat's right to apply the above-mentioned storage fee, in the event that the user fails to pick-up/receive their inventory (including items rejected or returned by the buyer) within (60) calendar days from the date on which the items are received at the relevant Collection Point and after Mazadat having issued two email notifications to the user to that effect, the inventory shall be considered as abandoned items under the possession of Mazadat, who may dispose of the inventory in any manner it deems appropriate with no further rights due to the seller.
